title: Anyone place higher this season?
body:
Just finished my promos... expecting at best Silver 5, prob high bronze after all those warning messages from riot.

Got Silver 3 {{summoner:13}} 

Finished season 7 at Silver 5 57LP
High point for season was Silver 2...i think 100LP... lost promos :(
Ended preseason at Silver 2 30ish LP
Promos Won 7 Lost 3 (W-W-L-L-W--L-W-W-W-W)
Interestingly op.gg was quite accurate in its predictions during the promos (MMR/Rank)

Anyone else place higher?? {{item:2319}}

replies.body:
I know a couple of people, but it is pretty rare. 

Congrats and good luck with the climb!

It depends on your MMR they said if some people had higher MMR they'd gain a rank or two but it's uncommon.

On a side note, I finished the season Silver 5 with 57 LP xD
don't think it's possible as riot said the soft reset was going to put them back a couple ranks than what the finished in last season?
